title: Android工程常用.gitignore
date: 2016-07-13 15:37:36
tags:
- Android
- git
categories: 移动开发

---

```bash
# OSX
*.DS_Store

# Windows thumbnail db
Thumbs.db

# Android studio
.gradle/
*/gradle/
gradle/
build/
*/build/
.idea
*/.idea/
*.iml
*/gradlew
*/gradlew.bat

# Built application files
*.apk
*.ap_

# Files for the Dalvik VM
*.dex

# Java class files
*.class

# Generated files
bin/
gen/

# Local configuration file (sdk path, etc)
local.properties

# Log Files
*.log

#NDK
obj/

```
